product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Sparkie Fire Starter
long_description: Designed for use in the most adverse weather conditions, the lightweight and compact Sparkie(TM) fire starter from Ultimate Survival Technologies is a must-have for any serious adventurer. Weighing in at less than 1 oz., the Sparkie fire starter is about a third the weight and less than half the volume of its big brother, the BlastMatch(TM). Internal tungsten carbide striker allows simple 1-handed operation; user must press thumb button to engage the striker. Rubberized grip gives you great control during use. Spring-loaded flint bar rotates 360deg to allow for even wear; bar retracts inside the body for compact storage. If the Sparkie gets wet, simply wipe it off and it's ready for use.
